reviews.text: I live in Albany New York but I came to Brooklyn to work for the whole day training teachers here at the ymca. I didn't know what to eat specially considering the fact that I was fasting the whole day. At 4:30 p.m. I decided to break my fast and I'm so glad I came across with this place because I love halal food.
zuhaib was amazing helped me make a substitute to my order and was quick to make order. This is THE place to go for halal if you on campus itâ€™s like a five min walk.

This is the best spot on Brooklyn college campus, itâ€™s affordable and the portion sizes are crazy. If you need to get a filling meal, or one to share I recommend the lamb over rice, they also have chicken, shrimp,steak,falafel,fish,chicken kofta kebab over rice. My favorite here is the cheese burger and fries, itâ€™s so juicy and fresh. But if you want a lighter burger get the smash burger. the lemonade is fresh and homemade. Thereâ€™s indoor and outside seating.
Everything we ate their was good. The owner is also very nice and humble. Food and hygiene was top notch. We will surely come back
Been wanting to try this place for a while, totally worth it.
Very good halal food. The service is as amazing and the chicken was very good.
Great service. Great experience. Make you feel welcome and the food is amazing. They fill your box to the top and make sure that you are satisfied.. my favorite halal place..

Halal N Out food is delicious & filling.  With certain combos you order they will make accommodations by allowing you to substitute a side with something else.  The service here is exceptional.  I would recommend this restaurant any day.
Very nice people and great food
Amazing staff, amazing food, overall amazing . I order here at least twice a week
I like the food and  the service was good
The food is best and I enjoy  alot

Open late, perfect if you're a college student as it's a short walk from Brooklyn College Campus. Portion size is generous, food is tasty, and service was quick and friendly. There's also a dessert area which I didn't try as it was a bit pricey in my opinion but did look tasty
I can admit I was surprised! Plenty of flavor!

Really good food and workers have a great personality

First time ordering I got the Mix over rice ,  the Food is really delicious and fresh they are not stingy with there portions , I Love the flavors the food actually has great flavor you can tell someoneâ€™s is cooking with love with the way the food taste . Everything is seasoned the way itâ€™s suppose to be , rice is fresh.When I ordered I also asked for lots of white sauce and they listened thank you so much

I called at 12 in the afternoon for an order and went into the location on flatbush. I waited over 20 minutes for my food after waiting 10 minutes  to get ready to go to the store, I had to wait the additional 20 minutes. The 2 male staff waited hand and foot for the ladies in scrubs though and gave them double portions of sauce with no extra charge. The guy that took my order over the phone said sorry, but I just did a double of 16 hrs so it was useless by that point as I waited over 30 minutes for the food that was usually good. It was mid today. I should have left the store because I was mad but I was hungry and it wasn't good.

The food was way too salty. It tasted just like every other new Halal place that has opened recently in Brooklyn. The abnormally red chicken and yellow rice had the exact same seasoning as many others. Perhaps they all use the same supplier? I ended up throwing the whole thing away. I'm not a fan and won't be ordering again.

This is truly a great establishment. Not only is the food always made fresh and delicious, but the customer service is a solid 10/10 every single time.

Today was rainy and gloomy, but I decided to step out and grab dinner from one of my favorite spots. I come here often, and thereâ€™s one particular guy (I wish Iâ€™d gotten his name!) whoâ€™s always so kind and helpful.

Anyway, he took my order as usual and I headed home. While crossing the street to my building, the paper bag they gave me completely burst (I even took a picture ğŸ« ). In a panic, I called the restaurant; they immediately remembered me and without hesitation offered to replace my entire meal at no charge.

I was so upset and frustrated, but their kindness completely turned my mood around. Now Iâ€™m sitting at home, full and happy, writing this review because itâ€™s rare to find a business that genuinely cares about their customers instead of just the money.

Thank you, Halal Bros, for turning what couldâ€™ve been a terrible evening into such a positive one. Youâ€™ve definitely earned a loyal customer for life!
â€“ Heidi :)

This place is great. Best bang for your buck. I was hungry  and I couldnâ€™t finish my meal. I tried the chicken over rice, they added fries. I was full and happy! The sauces are good too! Highly recommend! Best place to spend $14-$18 if you need a meal and a drink! Happy to tip the guys are good. The dessert place also being in there was a bonus!
Courteous service for my 1st time there. Food is well seasoned.  Prices are affordable. I got referred to eat here. I will refer other to eat here also.

The food here is good quality and great portions as you can see from the double cheeseburger combo picture. Itâ€™s one of the better halal food spots that are in NYC. The only downside would be that it doesnâ€™t have any good seating but to be honest, halal food is usually takeout anyway so its not a big deal at all. I have been here multiple times and the quality and service have been consistently good.
never got my order right on uber
Orders 2 times with them and they forgot to send sauces every time eat it dry ğŸ˜”ğŸ‘â€¦
Best Lamb and Chicken Gyro. $8 is a excellent price and they have student discounts
Very tasty
Best food in our Neighbourhood
Not so appreciative of the extremely loud music that I mentioned hurt my eyes and the volume not being lowered. It gave a splitting headache.

Not sure how authentic this halal is. They Oâ€™Deed on the sauce. And the staff was kinda careless with my food. While
She carried the tray my food hung out and touched her shirt.

Iâ€™m very thankful for this Halal restaurant in the Flatbush-Midwood area. The food is well seasoned and fresh. The variety of the menu is a definite plus, the place is never lacking customers. The staff is nice too, especially Christal, sheâ€™s such an asset to the business. What a gem! She is courteous, patient and so professional! ğŸ™‚ğŸ‘ğŸ½
ğŸ«µğŸ˜¤ You need to get a smash burger and pastrami right now. It will be so yummy and they will treat you so nice :)
Food is great and the staff is so nice. Never had them mess anything up. They always exceed my expectations

Owners and staff are amazing! Food is amazing and great! Open late as well

Love the smash burger, pastrami sandwich, boneless wings, platters, fried Oreos, man itâ€™s all good. Itâ€™s connected to a desert place too
The food was amazing. I only had two chicken tenders but it tasted like my mom used to cook. Very natural not like they just threw something out of the freezer. Will be back in the future for sure
Amazing food
Best customer service. Very clean establishment and great staff
Today food Bad ğŸ¤¢â€¦

Ordered Chicken over rice today
Most of the food was spoiled. Smelled bad tested off. More like yesterdays food. Even the cucumber and chicken had a nasty odor.

Very delicious halal food in Flatbush!
Workers are very kind,inside is very clean fast service.Keep up guys
Best fried ever
Great quality food and the service is very friendly. Always has me coming back for more

Food was great and big portions. Good flavors and presentation.
They were also amazing with my 6 year old, even brought her a free dessert (cupcake).

They got the best steak wrap ever!! I was craving good steak for a long time. Their was well marinated and tender. It had some sauteed onions that took it to the next level. And their house special yam yam sauce.
Itâ€™s my favorite spot for now as it got the connected layerâ€™s bakeshop outlet with dinning which made it easier to grab my deserts

This place recently opened up in an area that is very heavily focused on Caribbean food, so it was lacking in some middle eastern cuisine/ American halal food. This restaurant definitely fills up that spot. Their menu is expansive, they also have cold cut sandwiches which is extremely rare from a halal restaurant, at least the ones Iâ€™ve been to some have turkey sandwiches lol.

They also have your typical platters chicken/ lamb/ fish etc. Never had it, but it looks good. Pretty good prices all around, but does get a bit pricey if you want to get a couple different things. Came from the gym and I was looking for a protein rich post workout meal so I decided on a gyro. Full transparency, I havenâ€™t had many gyros but this was one of the best gyros Iâ€™ve had. $9. Ate it two different times. Definitely worth the money. The guy who made my gyro was friendly and definitely accommodating to my questions, and gave recommendations, he hooked my gyro up. I appreciated the love!

If youâ€™re in the area or if youâ€™re a local, itâ€™s definitely worth the visit even if itâ€™s to check out their menu. Kitchen was open and clean, work station was also tidy.

Overall, a great addition to the neighborhood! Give them a try, theyâ€™ll get you right. ğŸ”¥
Awesome new halal spot on Flatbush. I got the mixed plate. Donâ€™t sleep on this place itâ€™s amazing.

Pretty solid street meat got the mixed combo delivered in uber eats

halal N out includes fries in their combos as well as green sauce.

Also you can get 2 for 1 currently on uber eats
Great service and even better food. Would definitely try again!
Best Halal food in town! If youâ€™re looking for that perfect halal platter that hits every time, this is it. Halal N Out is the spot. 10/10 highly recommend!

honestly it was a 10/10 , the food is very flavorful and the workers customer service was great I wasnâ€™t sure what I wanted and he recommended me to lots of options and helped me decide, and it comes with lots of food

I donâ€™t usually write comments about food, but I feel compelled to share my experience with this place. It truly is the best food Iâ€™ve had in a long time, and I'm being completely honest. I often find myself disappointed with meals, but this place really stands out. I genuinely appreciate what they offer and would highly recommend trying it. Itâ€™s definitely become a favorite for me!

Halal Heaven!
Perfectly spiced halal chicken, fluffy rice, and that creamy white sauceâ€¦ absolutely unbeatable.
Absolutely fantastic place! The staff was friendly and accommodating. The food was delicious (the chicken over rice is the BEST). HIGHLY recommend.
Love halal n out, from food always being Fresh and tasteful to Great welcoming enviroment my go to lunch n dinner spot!! Also the stores has a nice ambiance and kept clean

This was by far the best food experience Iâ€™ve had in years. They use very fresh ingredients, which is always a plus. Also, they have more variety of salad and greens then many of your regular â€œrun of the millâ€ Halal spots. We are not going to gloss over their very seasoned rice and meat, something. I also have not experienced in a while. The customer service was also A1.

Service is A1. Staff members are kind and generous. Portions are great and the price is right.

One of the best salads I've ever had in my life! Burgers are slammin. Fries are yummy. Ingredients are fresh. Sauces are all good too. The halal platter was so much good food. There's really nothing bad I can say. I love eating here.

Introduced my whole family to halal food here and I'm very glad I did. The owner himself explained everything to my family and was super friendly. The food itself was some of the best halal food I've had and my whole family loved it. I'd recommend Halal-N-Out to everyone
Good food. I ordered the lamb gyro and loaded chop cheese fries and both were delicious. There's also a large array of sauces. All around great option to have living in the area.

These guys are the best. The customer service is on point. Good food and they add good portion of it too. There is a bakery inside this location as well which is pretty good too. Over all good positive vibes!
Their loaded fries is so goood. Very good price and big portion of food.
These guys are handsome and amazing ğŸ‘.  The food is always clean and good! Thank you guys for being such an amazing group of people ğŸ’•
Worst Halal food I ever had !!! They chicken over rice definitely not IT !!! NEVER AGAIN !!! THEY GAVE ME COLD FRIES !!!
The food is delicious! I tried the chicken over rice, cheese steak sandwich, and chicken gyro. 10/10.

Amazing Halal Fast Food Joint. Tried their wings and tenders and they were really good. Their Zinger Sandwich is straight fire! Also would highly recommend their Bacon Cheeseburger. Canâ€™t wait to go back.
Great food very reasonably priced friendly customer service
Really good food! This will def be a new go to for me.
The best halal resturant I tried and most different than other restaurants
So many options and the best part is the food is always fresh and hot!
